Summary: there's bugs ALL over the place. The wood is splitting apart where they interested. All over the sheets. Combative, rude owner that doesn't listen. Sets arbitrary rules and screams at you if you didn't obey. Better off at a cheap chain that has some sort of standards.

It was quiet. The room was clean. Lady at check in was nice. They do only let one car per room, but in reality, that's reasonable. We only had to stay one night. If you just need a place to rest your head for the night, I recommend it.

Not sure why the reviews are so poor here. My room is big and clean, flat-screen TV, mini fridge, and new wood floor. Only issue is weak WiFi signal which they are currently trying to improve. I'll be back, you can't beat the price.

I stayed 3 days last week and I didn't have time to use TV. They just called me that I broke TV. They checked no signal . I don't understanf why Tv no signal it's mean I broke TV . I PROMISE I DIDN'T USE TV. Everybody need be carefull when stay there. They need to charge more money that reason they called me. I NEVER COME BACK CHESTER INN MOTEL IN STANTON, CA.

Don't waste your money. You get watched all the time. Owners are rude! It's way overpriced. Was without wifi for a day and was accused of lying then they realised it wasn't working and fixed it. Came here to relax and how can you relax when they watch you 24/7. Then go to park your car in front your room and told to move your car because they want to see the fkreworks....really??
